scripts.dev:prod-shape: pnpm run build && wrangler dev --log-level warn --show-interactive-dev-session=false
scripts.bundle:docs: pnpm --filter liant-docs build && rm -rf dist/client/docs dist/client/docs.html dist/client/search-index.json && mkdir -p dist/client/docs dist/client/assets && cp -R docs-site/build/docs dist/client/ && cp docs-site/build/docs.html dist/client/docs.html && cp -R docs-site/build/assets/* dist/client/assets/ && cp docs-site/build/search-index.json dist/client/search-index.json
scripts.preview:docs-site: pnpm --filter liant-docs build && pnpm --filter liant-docs serve
